Satuccino: Monthly Space Networking Event - December 2025

3 December 2025 – 3 December 2025

Satellite Applications Catapult Electron Building, Fermi Avenue, Didcot, OX11 0QR, United Kingdom

Join us at Satuccino, our monthly networking event at the Satellite Applications Catapult. Connect with like-minded professionals, exchange ideas, and hear dynamic one-minute pitches from guest speakers. Hosted by the Satellite Applications Catapult in Harwell, the event provides insights into the latest industry news, funding opportunities, and business pitches from across the space sector. Space for the in-person event is limited, but online attendees are welcome for the pitch presentations from 2:30pm.

Green Orbit Digital

A full-service digital marketing agency specialising in the space and technology sectors, delivering data-driven strategies that drive growth, engagement, and impact. We partner with organisations and startups worldwide to optimise campaigns, create compelling content, and implement sustainable digital solutions that amplify their mission and reach.
